channel.title: Taxed GmbH - Swiss Tax Consulting
channel.description: Expert Swiss tax consulting services for expats and professionals. Latest news, insights, and tax tips.

item.title: Welcome to Taxed GmbH - Your Swiss Tax Partner
item.description: Welcome to Taxed GmbH, your trusted partner for Swiss tax consulting. We specialize in helping expats and professionals navigate the complexities of Swiss taxation.

item.title: Understanding Swiss Quellensteuer (Withholding Tax)
item.description: A comprehensive guide to understanding Swiss withholding tax (Quellensteuer) for expats and international professionals working in Switzerland.

item.title: Tax Planning Strategies for Expats in Switzerland
item.description: Essential tax planning strategies and tips for expats living and working in Switzerland. Learn how to optimize your tax situation.

item.title: Digital Tax Filing in Switzerland: What You Need to Know
item.description: Everything you need to know about digital tax filing in Switzerland. From requirements to benefits and how to get started.

item.title: Latest Swiss Tax Law Changes for 2025
item.description: Stay updated with the latest changes to Swiss tax laws and regulations for 2025. Important updates for individuals and businesses.
